attributes.action: Government Christmas party to be publicly investigated.
attributes.additional_details: To be honest and open with the British public who are losing faith with the current conservative party due to recent multiple issues such as the Peppa pig incident or Cumming castle trip.
attributes.background: If true this is incredibly upsetting for the British public, many of which were not able to see family and friends who passed away. The event should be investigated by an independent body and a public report made as soon as possible.

rejection.details: Since you started your petition the Government has published terms of reference for an investigation by the Cabinet Secretary into allegations of gatherings that took place or may have taken place last year: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/terms-of-reference-for-the-cabinet-secretarys-investigations
